mapper.insert: insert into user (id, pw, address,hp,gender,e_mail) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{address}, #{hp}, #{gender}, #{e_mail})
mapper.select: select id,pw,address,hp,gender,e_mail from user where id=#{UserId}
mapper.update: update user set pw = #{pw}, address = #{address}, hp = #{hp}, gender = #{gender}, e_mail = #{e_mail} where id=#{UserId}
